text: 1 cup Persian cucumbers (sliced into thin half moons)
label: ingredient

text: ½ cup chopped fresh mint leaves
label: ingredient

text: ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil (plus more for drizzling)
label: ingredient

text: 1 teaspoon herbes de Provence or dried Italian seasoning
label: ingredient

text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Prepare the pasta according to the package directions, or until slightly past al dente.
label: step

text: Meanwhile, make the dressing. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, mustard, garlic, herbes de Provence, red pepper flakes, and salt. (Note: the dressing will have a strong flavor, it’ll mellow once it coats all of the pasta salad ingredients).
label: step

text: Drain the pasta, toss it with a little olive oil (so that it doesn’t stick together) and let it cool to room temp. Transfer to a large bowl with the tomatoes, chickpeas, arugula, cucumbers, feta cheese, basil, parsley, mint, and pine nuts. Pour the dressing and toss to coat. Season to taste with more lemon, salt, pepper, and/or a drizzle of olive oil, if desired, and serve.
label: step
